content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to journal on #{daysOfWeek} starting from today until #{endDate}, between #{time}.

Each time, I will write honestly about my thoughts, feelings, or what happened during the day.

To prove my commitment, I will submit my journal entries on the days I‚Äôve committed. The title of my journal will always include the keyword '#{journalTag}' to ensure it's uniquely mine.

If I miss a day, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself ‚Äî to reflect, to grow, and to understand my journey better. ‚úçÔ∏èüß†
